name: Tanya HAND, Petitioner v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Hand v. Unemployment Compensation Board of Review

parties: Tanya HAND, Petitioner v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of September, 2010, the “Petition for Allowance,” treated as a Petition for Review, is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
8 A.3d 282
Tanya HAND, Petitioner v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Respondent.
No. 78 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 14, 2010.
